data.name: Racing the Gods - Beyond Horizons
data.detailed_description:
The most epic race of all times is about to start.

You have been selected as one of the drivers representing earth.
It’s race of live and death as only the fastest will survive.
Do you have what it takes?

The ultimate racing tournament beyond time and space awaits!

The gods of our galaxy have opened the gates of their habitats.
They are inviting one driver from each planet to show off their racing skills in a shire limitless world striking with beauty, extreme contrasts and breathtaking constructions.
But there is a lot on the line - the losing planets will be eliminated.

Race in a vibrant and ever-evolving world beyond imagination

The tournament features 20 tracks trough a world beyond our imagination.
It is unlike anything you have ever seen and only inhabited by titans - giant creates that have been deemed worthy of staying within the realm of the gods.
Racing has never been this epic!

What to expect:

  • A fast-paced racing experience
  • 20 different tracks through the world of the gods
  • Each world has a unique design and trist on the racing experience
  • Giant structure, monuments and monsters are just some of the obstacles that you have to overcome
  • Different weapons to clear the way and fight against the other racers
  • A unique art-style and the most vibrant and interactive racing world
  • Many cool upgrades and improvements for your hover bike
  • Singleplayer, Local Coop Multiplayer and Local VS Mode

data.short_description: The most epic race of all times is about to start. You have been selected as one of the drivers representing earth. It’s race of live and death as only the fastest will survive. Do you have what it takes?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX600
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: No specific requirements.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX700
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: No specific requirements.
